trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Marion

divs: Sighting Detailsat the time i was driving home from being out fishing i was on hy18 heading east in to marion when i seen what i thought was just stars close together then they started to get brighter and moving west slowly i throught i was just seeing things at frist but then one of the so stop et of lights broke away from the other one and stared heading south by the time i was able to pull over to stop and get out they were gone. both of the things had 3 lights on them one in frount and on each sides they would get bright then go dim the lights looked live they were evenly spaced out to and to far apart on them to be a plane or choper and moving to slow to be a plan to
